trans-unit.source: Provides basic functionality for controls that display a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> when a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton"></xref> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 표시 하는 컨트롤에 대 한 기본 기능을 제공 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> 때는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref>, 또는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton"> </xref> 컨트롤을 클릭 합니다.

trans-unit.source: ToolStripDropDownItem is the abstract base class for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>, which can host items directly or host additional items in a drop-down container.
trans-unit.target: ToolStripDropDownItem는에 대 한 추상 기본 클래스 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>, 직접 항목 또는 드롭 다운 컨테이너의 호스트 추가 항목을 호스팅할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>

trans-unit.source: You do this by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> property to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> and setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> 의 속성</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A> 을 설정 하</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> 는 속성</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> 을 설정 하 여이 작업을 수행합니다

trans-unit.source: Access these drop-down items directly through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownItems%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 드롭다운 목록 항목을 통해 직접 액세스는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownItems%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: You must derive a drop-down control from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> class in order to have any drop-down functionality for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> control.
trans-unit.target: 드롭다운 컨트롤에서 파생 되어야 합니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>클래스에 대 한 모든 드롭 다운 기능을 가지려면는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> class with the specified display text, image, and action to take when the drop-down control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref> 지정 된 표시 텍스트, 이미지 및 드롭다운 컨트롤을 클릭할 때 수행할 동작을 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You must derive a drop-down control from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> class in order to have any drop-down functionality for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> control.
trans-unit.target: 드롭다운 컨트롤에서 파생 되어야 합니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>클래스에 대 한 모든 드롭 다운 기능을 가지려면는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> 컨트롤에 표시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The action to take when the drop-down control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 드롭다운 컨트롤을 클릭할 때 수행할 동작입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> class with the specified display text, image, and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> collection that the drop-down control contains.

trans-unit.source: You must derive a drop-down control from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> class in order to have any drop-down functionality for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> control.
trans-unit.target: 드롭다운 컨트롤에서 파생 되어야 합니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>클래스에 대 한 모든 드롭 다운 기능을 가지려면는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> 컨트롤에 표시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a generic <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> for which events can be defined.
trans-unit.target: 제네릭 만듭니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> 이벤트에 대 한 정의할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The CreateDefaultDropDown method is automatically called if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> property finds no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>.
trans-unit.target: CreateDefaultDropDown 메서드는 경우 자동으로 호출 됩니다 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A>속성 찾습니다 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> 연관</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> 없습니다</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: The created <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 만든 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 관리 되지 않는 리소스를 해제는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref> 관리 되는 리소스를 선택적으로 해제 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 public `Dispose()`메서드 및 <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`보호 된 호출 `Dispose(Boolean)` 메서드는 `disposing` 매개 변수 설정 `true`합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>호출 `Dispose` 와 `disposing` 로 설정 `false`합니다.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> references.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 `disposing` 매개 변수가 true 이면이 메서드는 관리 개체가 보유 하는 모든 리소스를 해제 합니다.이 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>참조.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드 호출에서 `Dispose()` 각 참조 된 개체의 메서드.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>관리 되는 관리 되지 않는 리소스만 해제 하려면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 만 관리 되지 않는 리소스를 해제 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> that will be displayed when this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 가져오거나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> 수 있는 선택할 때 표시 된이 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref> 를 클릭 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>, a call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.CreateDefaultDropDown%2A> creates a generic drop-down control.
trans-unit.target: 없는 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>연결 된는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>에 대 한 호출 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.CreateDefaultDropDown%2A>제네릭 드롭다운 컨트롤을 만듭니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.CreateDefaultDropDown%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If a drop-down control is automatically generated, which means that items are added to the collection, and you then set the DropDown property to an explicit drop-down control, you might lose data.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 즉, 항목이 컬렉션에 추가 됩니다 드롭다운 컨트롤은 생성 자동으로 다음 명시적 드롭다운 목록 컨트롤에 드롭다운 속성을 설정 하는 경우 데이터가 손실 될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> 과 연관 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.target: 표시 하는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다. 여부는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown*>에 대 한는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref> 만들어졌습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown*> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> has been created otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown*>에 대 한는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref> 그렇지 않은 경우 만든 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> has <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> controls associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref> 가 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> 연결 된 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> has <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> controls; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> has <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> controls; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Makes a visible <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> hidden.
trans-unit.target: 표시 되 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> 숨겨진 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the HideDropDown method to prevent the user from choosing one of the options available on the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> control.
trans-unit.target: 사용자는 연결에서 사용 가능한 옵션 중 하나를 선택 하지 않도록 하려면 HideDropDown 메서드를 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Bounds*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 발생 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Bounds*>속성 변경.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Bounds*>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownClosed"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 발생 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownClosed"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 발생 시키는 대리자를 통해 이벤트 처리기를 호출 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [이벤트](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The OnDropDownClosed method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnDropDownClosed 메서드는 파생된 클래스가 대리자를 연결 하지 않고도 이벤트를 처리할를 수도 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 이 파생된 클래스에서 이벤트를 처리 하는 기본 방법입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>이벤트 데이터를 포함 하는.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>이벤트 데이터를 포함 하는.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> is in the pressed state.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref> 누른된 상태에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> is in the pressed state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref> 는 눌린에 상태가 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Processes a command key.
trans-unit.target: 명령 키를 처리 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message preprocessing to handle command keys.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 명령 키를 처리 하기 위해 메시지 전처리 하는 동안 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Command keys are keys that always take precedence over regular input keys.
trans-unit.target: 명령 키가 일반 입력된 키 보다 항상 우선 하는 키입니다.

trans-unit.source: Examples of command keys include accelerators and menu shortcuts.
trans-unit.target: 명령 키의 예로 액셀러레이터 키 및 바로 가기 메뉴를 들 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The method must return `true` to indicate that it has processed the command key, or `false` to indicate that the key is not a command key.
trans-unit.target: 메서드 반환 해야 `true` 명령 키가 처리 되었는지 나타내는 또는 `false` 키 명령 키 임을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> implementation of this method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ProcessCmdKey%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> if there are items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownItems%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>이 메서드의 구현을 호출 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ProcessCmdKey%2A>의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A>에 항목이 있는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownItems%2A>컬렉션.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ProcessCmdKey%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this implementation calls the base class implementation.
trans-unit.target: 그렇지 않으면이 구현에서는 기본 클래스 구현을 호출 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>, 처리할 창 메시지를 나타내는 참조로 전달 합니다.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> 처리할 키를 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>모든 경우

trans-unit.source: Processes a dialog key.
trans-unit.target: 대화 상자 키를 처리합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message preprocessing to handle the UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT, ENTER, and SPACEBAR keys in order to navigate the hierarchy of drop-down menus.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 위쪽, 아래쪽, 왼쪽, 오른쪽, ENTER, 및 스페이스바 키 드롭 다운 메뉴의 계층 구조를 탐색 하기 위해 처리 하기 위해 메시지를 전처리 하는 동안 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> 처리할 키를 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key was processed by the item; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>항목;에서 키를 처리 하는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Displays the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> control associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 표시는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref> 이 연결 된 컨트롤 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the ShowDropDown method to display the drop-down controls that have been set by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ShowDropDown 메서드를 사용 하 여 설정 되어 있는 드롭다운 목록 컨트롤을 표시 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> is the same as the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref> 부모와 같습니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>합니다.
